content: Given that it has seen a bit of attention recently it seems like a good idea to leave a note in the registry repo about ongoing development: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/registry/pull/317
We could also archive the repo once we remove the dependencies from wasm-pkg-tools
I have archived this repo (again) to avoid people wasting their time on PRs that aren't being reviewed. We can always re-un-archive if there is another bug fix needed.
